lines.text: Write conversion factor so units cancel

secText: We show how to convert between British and metric units. We use the same process as we did with prefixes.
We use the conversion factor 1 mile equals 1.61 kilometers.
We multiply by the conversion factor so the units will cancel.
When we multiply, the kilometer units cancel since they are in the numerator and denominator, leaving us with 26.1 miles.
The table shows some common conversion factors.
